addLiquidity.title: Add liquidity
addLiquidity.priceFormMessage: We could not fetch the current price for the pair. Please set the prices manually.
addLiquidity.liquidityShapeDescription: Liquidity shape allows you to place your liquidity into several bins and aggregate liquidity with other liquidity providers. Precision {precision}.

descriptions.focused: Focused liquidity shape takes current price and adds the most liquidity to the current bin price. It adds little less liquidity to the surrounding bins, and adds minimum liquidity to the min and max price.
descriptions.spread: Spread liquidity shape takes current price and adds the small liquidity to the current bin price. It adds little more liquidity to the surrounding bins, and adds maximum liquidity to the min and max price.
descriptions.equal: Equal liquidity shape adds the same liquidity to all bins from min to max price.
descriptions.single: Single bin does not use the bin tick system but uses the single liquidity pool with defined minimum price and maximum price.
descriptions.wall: Wall order allows you to define the single price and when current price is below, others can buy at the price level, and if the current price is above the fixed price others will sell at the price level. This order type allows you to make a liquidity wall, and you will earn money whenever the price is volatile over this price level.

about.title: About Biatec DEX
about.intro: Self custody decentralized exchange built on AVM. We are working on <clamm>Concentrated liquidity AMM</clamm> protocol where a person can set liquidity in a specific price range.
about.ecosystem: We utilize not just our liquidity protocol, but each market order executes throughout the {environment} ecosystem using a DEX aggregator.
about.aggregator: At the moment the DEX aggregator used is <folks>Folks Router</folks>.
about.chart: At the moment the chart library used is <vestige>Vestige widget</vestige>.
about.grantText: This work has been performed with support from the Algorand Foundation xGov Grants Program <xgov>xGov#80</xgov>. <source>Source code</source>.
about.disclaimer1: Even though Biatec DEX trading is already working, the concentrated liquidity smart contract is still under development, and changes to the web may still occur. You are using beta software and are responsible for verifying every transaction you sign.
about.disclaimer2: SELF CUSTODY â€“ We do not hold your assets at any moment. You interact directly with smart contracts and are responsible for securing your Algorand accounts.
about.disclaimer3: We use ARC14 authorization to verify you are the holder of the account. You may use an ARC76 email-password Algorand account and will be asked to submit the password each time you make transactions. Most Algorand wallets can sign transactions.
about.disclaimer4: The highest security can be achieved by using a multisig account with a 2FA setup that includes multiple hardware devices (e.g., Ledgers).
about.disclaimer5: The lowest security, but fastest trading experience, can be achieved with a mnemonic.
about.assetsDescription: We plan to be a MiCA-compliant company, therefore we try to limit the use of scam coins, rug-pull tokens, pump-and-dump tokens, or tokens without any utility.
about.legalInfo: Website dex.biatec.io is run by Scholtz & Company, jsa. Trade registry ID: 51882272; Tax ID: 2120828105.
about.legalGroup: Biatec DEX is part of Biatec Group - <biatec>www.biatec.io</biatec>.
